scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && web-ext build --source-dir dist/chrome --artifacts-dir dist --filename faceit_2d_replay-chrome-{version}.zip --overwrite-dest
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && web-ext build --source-dir dist/firefox --artifacts-dir dist --filename faceit_2d_replay-firefox-{version}.zip --overwrite-dest
scripts.package: npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox
scripts.package:firefox:signed: npm run build:firefox && web-ext sign --source-dir dist/firefox --artifacts-dir dist --api-key $FIREFOX_API_KEY --api-secret $FIREFOX_API_SECRET
